author: Kim Smith
title: Man “Leads” Women’s Protest
text:
DEVELOPING: Trump Considers Sending B-52 Nuclear Bombers to Korean Peninsula 
The protest was intended to be a strike during which women would “refrain from paid and unpaid work” and “refrain from shopping in stores or online” to highlight their economic power and significance. 
Liberals have some serious problems with this matter. Feminists fought for decades for women to have a place in the work force, and insisting they stay home is no way to recognize them and their importance to society. 
And shopping? Really? That’s the contribution from women that feminists want to highlight — shopping? 
Not to mention there’s something about a man leading a woman’s march that is just weird. 
Share this story on Facebook and Twitter if you agree that a man leading a march to empower women is odd. What do you think of this march? Scroll down to comment below! Advertisement Popular Right Now
